title: BIG FACTS feat. PASTOR TROY
itunes:title: BIG FACTS feat. PASTOR TROY
description:
Southern Hip-Hop legend Pastor Troy stops by Big Facts to discuss his timeless hit "We Ready", Master P, Young Jeezy, ATL sports, transitioning into film and more.
